name: Participation and Citizenship
goal: PARTICITIZ, Participation & Citizenship association, designs, develops and tests new and innovative processes of citizens’ participation and deliberation, being “face to face” or “online”. These new participatory and deliberative designs are offered to public authorities and initutions as well as political representatives.
interests: Communication, Education, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
- European Citizen's Initiative and its reform

- Reaching out to the EU citizens: a new opportunity (Luc Van den Brande)

- H2020 on democracy and citizenship
